definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">engiesvanillaextras:deny_tpa</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a[tag=tpa.target] [""{"text":"You have denied ","color":"red"},{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.sender]","color":"yellow"},{"text":"'s teleport request.","color":"red"}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a[tag=tpa.sender] ["",{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.target,limit=1]","color":"yellow"},{"text":" has denied your teleport request.","color":"red"}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
